user.description: Do you want to start setup?

turn_on.description: Sets the light RGB to the predominant color found in the image provided by URL or file path.

color_extract_path.description: The full system path to the image we want to extract RGB values from. Must be allowed in allowlist_external_dirs.
color_extract_path.name: Path

color_extract_url.description: The URL of the image we want to extract RGB values from. Must be allowed in allowlist_external_urls.
color_extract_url.name: URL

turn_on.name: Turn on
